artist: Painter: After Willem van de Velde I; Painter: After Willem van de Velde the Younger; Engraver: Francois Dequevauviller
description: ships on a calm sea; small boat left foreground with a man standing by mast; row boat at center with flag and standing man; 2 small boats at right with a rowing boat apporaching; barrel floating right foreground

Signature, Title, and Inscription

upper right corner in black: 110 / below image in black: Guil. Vande Welde   Dequevauviller Sc. / LE MER ADRIATIQUE | on sheet in pencil: 2-530
title: The Adriatic Sea
